summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5754 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 34, Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue, from Howell Street to Stewart Street; by paving the same; under Ordinance No. 75884, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
